notes: Revolutionary streamlined design by John Tjaarda. Unibody construction. More affordable Lincoln to compete with Packard. Flathead V12 engine. Continental was derived from Zephyr. Vintage service requires specialized knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lincoln Zephyr article, January 2025 revision.

Top-of-line Lincoln with massive V12 engine. Competed with Cadillac V16 and Packard Twelve. Custom coachbuilt bodies available. Largest displacement Lincoln engine until 1970s. Depression-era luxury car requires highly specialized vintage expertise. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lincoln Model K article, January 2025 revision.

Mid-range Lincoln V12 model. Smaller engine than KB. More affordable Depression-era luxury option. Vintage complexity requires period-specific service knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lincoln Model K article, January 2025 revision.
